item.title: Typography
item.description: Typography Type is a beautiful group of letters, not a group of beautiful letters. - Matthew Carter Font The base font-family for Fannypack is Source Sans Pro in 3 styles: regular, semi-bold and bold. item.title: Grid
item.description: Grid We have a standard 12 column grid for you available. You can do any combination of columns as long as the total of each (virtual) row is 12. .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-1 .col-2 .col-2 .col-2 .col-2 .col-2 .col-2 .col-3 .col-3 .col-3 .col-3 .col-4 .col-4 .col-4 .col-5 .col-5 .col-2 .col-6 .col-6 .col-7 .col-5 .col-8 .
